headline.main: CHURCH COUNCIL GIVES ITS ADVICE ON PEACE; Issues Booklet for Guidance of Religions Groups

lead_paragraph: The commission to study the bases of a just and durable peace of the Federal Council of Churches issued a statement entitled "Long Range Peace Objectives" yesterday to assist local church groups that are studying the problem. The paper was written by John Foster Dulles, a Presbyterian layman and chairman of the commission. It is available to church groups in j booklet form.
abstract: Fed Council of Chs issues peace aims booklet

keywords.name: organizations
